text: [[img:hkrul_norsca_dino]][[/img]][[col:green]]Construct [[col:yellow]]Monogod Monoliths[[/col]] and slowly corrupt [[col:yellow]]Feral Dinosaurs[[/col]] which may be recruited for [[col:yellow]]Skeggi's[[/col]] armies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].
[[col:red]]To unlock this building you must first finish the "The Bjornling King" quest[[/col]]
Gain the Bjornlings blessing to build Losteriksson's Great Hall

[[img:hkrul_norsca_trickster]][[/img]][[col:green]]Sayl is the [[col:yellow]]Ultimate Deceiver[[/col]] and can use earned allegiance points in dangerous [[col:yellow]]Barters with the Gods[[/col]] to obtain powerful [[col:yellow]]Mortal Units[[/col]].[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:hkrul_norsca_horse]][[/img]][[col:green]]Breed Chaos Steeds in [[col:yellow]]Exotic Animal[[/col]] and [[col:yellow]]Pastures[[/col]] buildings. Use these [[col:yellow]]Chaos Steeds[[/col]] to upgrade [[col:yellow]]Chaos Knights[[/col]] with powerful boons. [[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:hkrul_contact_icefang]][[/img]][[col:green]] Achieve victories in regions with [[col:yellow]]Frozen[[/col]] and [[col:yellow]]Chaotic[[/col]] climates and obtain powerful Ice formed units.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:hkrul_norsca_tzeentch]][[/img]][[col:green]]Marauder Chieftains may devote themselves to [[col:yellow]]Tzeentch[[/col]] allowing them to turn into powerful [[col:yellow]]Chaos Lords of Tzeentch[[/col]]. Additionally armies may use the [[col:yellow]]Teleport Stance[[/col]] under certain conditions.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:hkrul_norsca_fish]][[/img]][[col:green]]Bjornling are adept fishermen and can harvest fish using the [[col:yellow]]Fishing Stance[[/col]] whilst at sea. Fish can can be sold to trading partners using the [[col:yellow]]Fishmarket.[[/coll].[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:hkrul_norsca_graeling]][[/img]][[col:green]]Unite the Northern Tribes via various [[col:yellow]]missions [[/col]]and unify Norsca under one Graeling [[col:yellow]]rule[[/col]].[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]][[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:hkrul_norsca_wood]][[/img]][[col:green]]Sarl are excellent lumberjacks, [[col:yellow]]Timber Buildings[[/col]] provide unique [[col:yellow]]global bonusses [[/col]]when constructed.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:hkrul_norsca_monster]][[/img]][[col:green]]Birna is a fabeled huntress who can revisit [[col:yellow]]completed monster hunts [[/col]]after obtaining [[col:yellow]]victories [[/col]]against certain [[col:yellow]]cultures[[/col]].[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:icon_skulls]][[/img]][[col:green]]Send a tribute of Skulls to the [[col:yellow]]Blood Throne[[/col]] to obtain powerful [[col:yellow]]Boons of Khorne[[/col]]. Additionally, [[col:yellow]]Blood Hosts[[/col]] will spawn after [[col:yellow]]Razing Settlements[[/col]].[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:hkrul_norsca_forsaken]][[/img]][[col:green]]The Varg are counted among the most [[col:yellow]]mutated[[/col]] and as such marauders may slowly transform into [[col:yellow]] Chaos Spawn[[/col]] when winning battles in regions with [[col:yellow]]High Chaos Corruption[[/col]].[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].
Rift
This rift can be used to travel between Dark Fortress of the Norscan's pact

[[img:hkrul_norsca_devotees]][[/img]][[col:green]]Gather and obtain [[col:yellow]]Devotees[[/col]] who can be sacrified for powerful [[col:yellow]]Chaos Gifts[[/col]] of[[col:yellow]] Slaanesh[[/col]].[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:icon_god_hound]][[/img]][[col:green]] Recruit Skin Wolf Packlords to lead your armies across the world. Huern and his Packlords have access to unique Hunting Journey targets. Defeat armies with specific enemies to unlock powerful buffs for the lord or their army.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_ogr_camps]][[/img]] [[col:green]] Skin Wolf Packlords have access to mobile Hunting Camps which provide limited recruitment options and unlock improvements for their army in both campaign and battle.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_nor_outpost]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Conquer special locations across the world to develop into fully-fledged Norscan strongholds that enable powerful technologies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].
PLACEHOLDER

[[img:hkrul_norsca_devotion]][[/img]][[col:green]]Bjornling worship the Gods of men and can influence the [[col:yellow]]Civil War[[/col]] by sending [[col:yellow]]Raiding Parties[[/col]] to Kislev. This generates [[col:yellow]]devotion[[/col]] which can be used to[[/col]] [[col:yellow]]invoke the Gods.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].
